DOC.brief_summary: This study intend compare pharmacokinetic characteristic , safety tolerability two formulation lamotrigine healthy male female volunteer
DOC.brief_title: Study Compare Two Formulations Lamotrigine Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Body weight > 50 kg ( male ) > 45 kg ( female ) BMI within range 19 30 kg/m2 inclusive . Female subject childbearing potential eligible participate unwilling unable use appropriate method contraception least 30 day prior first study drug 30 day . Female subject pregnant ( positive serum human chorionic gonadotrophin ( hCG ) test Screening predose study ) lactating . Female subject use hormonal contraceptive precaution include progesteronecoated intrauterine device ( IUD ) . Female subject use hormonal replacement therapy . History regular alcohol consumption Current smokers 10 cigarette per day
